Will Centrelink back pay child care subs.answer: The income eligibility limits vary based on family size, and household income. Families may qualify if the gross household income is aless than $3286/month for a family size of two, $4059/month for a family size of three, and $4832/month for a family size of four.

How do I claim child care subsidy?.answer: most Centrelink payments are back paid to the date of application.
